channel.title: Gatsby Starter Blog RSS Feed
channel.description: Football Wordle games Footbl 5, Footbl 6 and Missing 11 go viral amongst football fans

item.title: Player Names can be Rude and Funny
item.description: Have you played Footbl 5 yet? The football game that is going viral on social media. Play on your phone, iPad, laptop or PC. Footbl5 is…
item.content:encoded:
Have you played Footbl 5 yet?

The football game that is going viral on social media. Play on your phone, iPad, laptop or PC. Footbl5 is based upon Football Wordle, you must guess the famous footballer’s surname.

Some player’s names can be rude or funny, though and they could well appear as answers on Lewdle, another Wordle inspired game where the player guesses the swear word.

Why not check out our Football Wordle Top Ten?

  1. Ice Cream
    Ice Cream is a Nigerian midfielder who has played for various clubs in Macedonia, Austria, Malta and Israel.

  2. Fabian Assman
    Argentinian goalkeeper playing for Independiente in the Primera División.

  3. Paul Dickov
    Retired Scottish striker who played over 400 games for Arsenal, Leicester City, Blackburn Rovers and Man City.

  4. David Seaman
    Well known retired goalkeeper who played for Arsenal and England.

  5. Bernt Haas
    Haas played for Sunderland and West Bromwich Albion.

  6. Stefan Kuntz
    Stefan Kuntz is a German professional football manager and former player who played as a striker. He is the head coach of the Turkey national team.

  7. Dean Windass
    Retired striker for Hull City, Bradford City and other clubs with 732 games and 234 goals.

  8. Argelico Fucks
    Retired Brazilian footballer, who played for FC Porto and SL Benfica.

  9. Nortei Nortey
    English-Ghanaian midfielder who plays for Northern Colorado Hailstorm in USL League One.

  10. Chiqui Arce
    Chiqui Arce played right back for Paraguay in the 1998 and 2002 World Cups.

Footbl5 pays homage to Josh Wardle in this challenging new browser game that has gone viral.

Twitter is filling up with users who publish their results. Guess the hidden past or present footballer in 6 tries in this football wordle game. A new player is available each day.

So if you’re a Chiqui arce, very Nortei Nortey or just want an Ice Cream, then why not challenge your mates to this test of your footballing knowledge.

Bye
James Bye (RIP) who played for Birmingham City FC

item.title: The Perfect Match
item.description: Are you obsessed with Wordle? This word guessing game has everyone posting their results on social media. We probably become obsessed…
item.content:encoded:
Are you obsessed with Wordle? This word guessing game has everyone posting their results on social media. We probably become obsessed because we are rationed to one game a day.

Are you also obsessed with football? A football-phile, a nerd, or a fan-atic whose player knowledge is legendary. We soon become addicted to our PC console football games; Football Manager, FIFA or PES. We can’t get enough of them!

What happens though, when the worlds of Wordle and Football collide? Simples… it’s Football Wordle, the new and challenging phenomena for people of all ages. Games including Footbl 5, Footbl 6 and Missing 11 are each as challenging as one another.

The Footbl connoisseur will enjoy constructing the surnames of professional footballers in both 5 and 6 word formats. The progression then is to challenge yourself further with the 11 missing players iconic game format, inspired by Sky Sports’ Missing Men. Can you name the Liverpool team who won the European Cup against AC Milan in 2005? Beat your mates, in this ultimate test of football knowledge. Then share on social media - if you’re good enough!

Forget the Rest, Play the Best.
